answers.text: Never! I'm a level 7 vegan: I'm married to a carrot
No - I'm vegan, no food with a face
I'm vegetarian - cheese and eggs are some of my closest friends
I'm a flexitarian/pescetarian - but I don't eat beef
I'm partial to the odd sausage
I have a meaty treat most days
I eat beef all day long

questionHeading: How much of your food is locally-sourced?
questionSubHeading: (Fun fact! Did you know that switching to a plant-based diet for just one day a week saves more carbon emissions than eating 100% locally-sourced food?)

answers.text: All of it! I grow my own veg
A lot! I'm a regular at my local farmers' market
Quite a lot - I try to eat seasonally and sometimes I think about food miles
Ummmmm I don't know? I buy it in a local supermarket, but where it's been before the supermarket is anyone's guess
None of it! I ONLY eat food that has been on a plane - in fact, I have my own private jet just for sandwiches

questionHeading: How much food do you end up throwing away?

answers.text: None of it - I am a highly evolved meal planner, and I compost all my peelings etc
Very little of it - I treat 'use by dates' with a daredevil disdain
Some of it... sometimes I buy more than I need
All of it! I buy food just so I can put it in the bin!
